attributes.action: stop letting illegal immigrants in the country there are too many foreigners our country cant cope any longer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: too many are already here yet more and more are being let in and going straight on benefits that they have paid nothing into we are paying to keep them and its all wrong there are not enough jobs for brittish people so why are you letting more people in to the country that already have somewhere to live please stop letting so many in and please deport the troublesome immigrants out of the country as things seem to be getting worse lets get britain back to a decent country to live and visit not a dumping ground for anyone and everyone

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
